hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /ansible-elk-revised echo pwd export HOME=/home/$USER vpcid=$(aws ec2 describe-vpcs --query 'Vpcs[*].VpcId' --output text) subnetid=$(aws ec2 describe-subnets --filters "Name=vpc-id,Values=$vpcid") ansible-playbook -i hosts --tags "setup" ec2.yml --extra-vars "vpcid=$vpcid vpc_subnet=$subnetid" ansible-playbook -i hosts --tags "vinkar" ec2.yml ansible-playbook -i hosts --tags "provision" ec2.yml
